pageTitle:
Save & Earn More
With Top Payment
And POS Solutions
hp2pageTitle: Same Day Funding With Credit Card Processing Solutions
merchant_desc: We're able to maintain our services at no cost to you by applying a 3.5% charge on your customer's order total during the checkout process. On top of that, your customers cover the credit card fees, relieving you of any merchant fees.

merchant_option.heading: Small Restaurant
items: Includes a POS, KDS, Car Reader, Printer, and Cash Drawer
Analytics Dashboard, QR Code /Online Ordering, Gift Cards, Order Notifications
LTE Connectivity Available at S30/mo per line

merchant_option.heading: Med Restaurant
items: Includes a POS, KDS, 2 Handheld POS's, 3 Card Readers, 2 Printers, and Cash Drawer
Analytics Dashboard, QR Code /Online Ordering, Gift Cards, Order Notifications
Additional POS's and KDS's available at $30/mo

merchant_option.heading: Large Restaurant
items: Includes a POS, KDS, Card Readers, Handheld POS's, Printer, and Cash Drawer
Analytics Dashboard, QR Code /Online Ordering, Gift Cards, Order Notifications
LTE Connectivity Available at S30/mo per line

competitive_advantage.heading: Our Competitive  Advantage
competitive_advantage.sub_heading: At ExtraBread, we're all about improving your business's bottom line by reducing unnecessary credit card processing and POS System fees.  Our partners, expertise, and approach are what sets us apart.

items.title: Partnerships
items.desc: Our partnership with top-tier credit card processing and point-of-sale providers in the industry gives us the flexibility to arrange the best package for your business.

items.title: Expertise
items.desc: With a solid two decades under our belt, we know what system and features your business requires.

items.title: Our Approach
items.desc: You can count on us to guide you through every step plus some more.
